Key Match Events: The Bulls overcame a 20-point deficit to defeat the Grizzlies 126-123
Zach LaVine scored 11 points in the fourth quarter to key the Bulls' comeback
Miscellaneous Highlights: Desmond Bane led Memphis with 30 points, making 11 of 19 shots, including 6 of 10 from 3-point range
Others: Jaren Jackson Jr. had 19 points, while Jake LaRavia finished with 17 points, and Scotty Pippen Jr. had 14 points and 10 assists for Memphis
Coby White scored 20 and Josh Giddey finished with 12 points, eight assists and 13 rebounds for the Bulls
Josh Giddey had a key offensive rebound in the final seconds
